about_the_game:
Get ready to push your limits in the most challenging racing championship yet! Fog Racing Circuit introduces a new tournament that will test even the most seasoned drivers. This isn't just about speed—it's about survival in extreme conditions.

Forget rain, snow, or hail; this time, it's the thick, impenetrable fog that will keep your foot off the gas. With visibility at an all-time low, only the most daring will thrive. If your eyesight is sharp and your nerves are steel, you might have the edge you need to outpace the competition.

But beware, danger lurks just 100 meters ahead, and you’ll never know what’s coming until it’s almost too late. Master the treacherous tracks and claim your title as the ultimate risk-taker and champion of the Fog Racing Circuit.

Main Game Features:

- Three Intense Game Modes: Single Race, Championship, and Free Play.
- 10 Challenging Levels: Each one more treacherous than the last.
- Dynamic Weather: Experience the thrill and danger of racing in extreme fog conditions.

name: Fog Racing Circuit

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gt 1030
  • Storage: 278 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gt 1030
  • Storage: 278 MB available space
